homepage.about.title: Homemade Ingredients, Family Recipes
homepage.about.text: Restaurant & Pizzeria Šimun is a family-run hospitality establishment where you can indulge in delicious food while feeling at home. Established in 1997 from the vision to provide a simple yet warm and pleasant experience. Offering fresh produce every day, we ensure that you will remember the experience of your visit. Located in the center of the small but beautiful town of Vodice, it's not hard to come across us. Enjoy an evening on the beautiful terrace, have a drink or maybe two, and explore the wonders of the local cuisine.
homepage.menu.about: At Restaurant & Pizzeria Šimun, food is more than just a meal; it's a sensory experience that awakens all your senses. Our kitchen is a fusion of passion for food and carefully selected ingredients. From succulent appetizers to main courses, we promise you a gastronomic journey with local and fresh ingredients. Enjoy our space where flavors meet a pleasant atmosphere, creating unforgettable moments. Restaurant & Pizzeria Šimun - where every bite tells its own story, and every meal becomes an experience.
metaTags_description: Welcome to Restoran & Pizzeria Šimun, where you can enjoy delicious Dalmatian cuisine in a cozy atmosphere. Explore our menu and reserve a table for an unforgettable dining experience.
homepage.menu.title: Try our offer
